editorialNotes.standard: Custom decks, quick matches, and new twists make this smartly designed mobile spin on the beloved card collector a great fit for both newcomers and veterans.
We love chilling with friends in this classic card game‚Äôs standard mode or shaking things up with wild new rules and team-based play.
Build streaks and candify postcards of locations like Waikiki Beach and the Eiffel Tower in this sugary sweet spin on solitaire.

editorialNotes.standard: Clear boards by spelling words rather than building piles of cards in this clever spin on the all-time classic.

Fast-paced, accessible, and utterly brilliant, Marvel Snap‚Äôs quick, competitive matches are packed with seemingly infinite possibilities. Do you annoy opponents by dominating the first round‚Äôs playing field with Squirrel Girl‚Äôs rodent hordes? Or do you build your 12-card deck around the complementary card effects of the Guardians of the Galaxy? There‚Äôs no wrong answer. Fantastic animations, abilities, and art that perfectly channel the personality of the comics help make this one of the best card games on the App Store.
